channel.title: Andrew Adriance - site
channel.description: The random and disconnected work and thoughts of a programmer

item.title: One Month Of Posts
item.author: Unknown
item.description: This site started with a cheeky "Hello World" post in 2019. I has ambitions of writing for this site, but failed until 2022 when I found the time to do a silly piece of satire crossing the mediums of code and writing. This month that trajectory changes.

item.title: Hello World!
item.author: Unknown
item.description:
Hello!

Welcome to my new site. I had literally zero reason to update it. However, I was tired of looking at the mess the old site was. Maybe I'll write some blog posts.
